summary: Frontend testing complete for Quick Actions feature in My Positions widget. All 7 features verified and working correctly.

my_positions_display.details: My Positions section displays 2 positions (MSFT, NVDA) correctly with live P&L data

quick_actions_toggle.details: MoreHorizontal toggle button (data-testid='position-actions-toggle-{symbol}') appears on hover over position card with opacity transition (group-hover:opacity-100)

action_buttons.details: Clicking toggle reveals 4 action buttons: Close (red bg-red-500/20), Add (green bg-emerald-500/20), Alert (amber bg-amber-500/20), Chart (cyan bg-cyan-500/20)

close_button_dialog.details: Close button opens confirmation dialog with correct data - shows 'Close Position' title, symbol, '242 shares at market', and market price. Dialog has Cancel and 'Close Position' buttons

add_button_dialog.details: Add button opens confirmation dialog for adding to position with 'Add to Position' action

alert_button.details: Alert button triggers price alert creation via handleSetPriceAlert() which calls /api/ib/alerts/price/set with above and below price alerts (Â±5%)

chart_button.details: Chart button calls onViewChart(pos.symbol) to navigate to chart view

confirmation_dialog_modes: Close Position (isClose: true) - Red styling with Minus icon
Add to Position (isAdd: true) - Green styling with Plus icon

context_for_next_testing_agent: Quick Actions feature is fully implemented in AICommandPanel.jsx. PositionCard component (lines 229-388) has hover-revealed menu with 4 action buttons. handleClosePosition, handleAddToPosition, handleSetPriceAlert functions handle the actions. ConfirmationDialog component (lines 583-685) supports close and add modes with appropriate styling.
